turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I would like a Starbucks espresso beverage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a medium, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will like a I will like it skimmed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: from which location are you picking it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 1501 E Broad St.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. Your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
